parameters.name: DedicatedHostClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the dedicated host cluster.

parameters.name: DedicatedHostIds
parameters.description: The IDs of dedicated hosts. You can specify up to 100 dedicated host IDs in a single request. Separate the IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: DedicatedHostName
parameters.description: The name of the dedicated host.

parameters.name: DedicatedHostType
parameters.description: The dedicated host type. You can call the [DescribeDedicatedHostTypes](~~134240~~) operation to query the most recent list of dedicated host types.

parameters.name: LockReason
parameters.description:
The reason why the dedicated host is locked. Valid values:

*   financial: The dedicated host is locked due to overdue payments.
*   security: The dedicated host is locked due to security reasons.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The page number.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the dedicated host. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group to which the dedicated host belongs. When this parameter is specified to query resources, up to 1,000 resources that belong to the specified resource group can be displayed in the response.

> Resources in the default resource group are displayed in the response regardless of how this parameter is set.

parameters.name: SocketDetails
parameters.description: Whether to display socket capacity information

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The service state of the dedicated host. Valid values:

*   Available: The dedicated host is running normally.
*   UnderAssessment: The dedicated host is available but has potential risks that may cause the ECS instances on the dedicated host to fail.
*   PermanentFailure: The dedicated host encounters permanent failures and is unavailable.
*   TempUnavailable: The dedicated host is temporarily unavailable.
*   Redeploying: The dedicated host is being restored.

Default value: Available.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the dedicated host.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the dedicated host. You can call the [DescribeZones](~~25610~~) operation to query the most recent zone list.
